8 // Unary operators - ABS, LN, SQRT, INV, OPP
9 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
10 double AbsOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
11  throw (TokenException)
12 {
13  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
14 
15 
16  return fabs(operands[0]);
17 }
18 
19 double LnOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
20  throw (TokenException)
21 {
22  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
23 
24 
25  if (operands[0] <= 0)
26  {
27  std::string msg;
28  msg += "Cannot apply ln(.) on a number <= 0! ";
29  msg += "(token evaluation)\n";
30 
31  throw TokenException(msg);
32  }
33 
34  return log(operands[0]);
35 }
36 
37 double SqrtOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
38  throw (TokenException)
39 {
40  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
41 
42 
43  if (operands[0] < 0)
44  {
45  std::string msg;
46  msg += "Cannot apply sqrt(.) on a number < 0! ";
47  msg += "(token evaluation)\n";
48 
49  throw TokenException(msg);
50  }
51 
52  return sqrt(operands[0]);
53 }

55 double InvOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
56  throw (TokenException)
57 {
58  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
59 
60 
61  if (operands[0] == 0)
62  {
63  std::string msg;
64  msg += "Cannot apply inv(.) on a number equal to 0! ";
65  msg += "(token evaluation)\n";
66 
67  throw TokenException(msg);
68  }
69 
70  return (1.0 / operands[0]);
71 }

73 double OppOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
74  throw (TokenException)
75 {
76  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
77 
78 
79  return -operands[0];
80 }

83 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
84 // Binary operators - SUB, DIV
85 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
86 double SubOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
87  throw (TokenException)
88 {
89  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
90 
91 
92  return (operands[1] - operands[0]);
93 }
94 
95 double DivOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
96  throw (TokenException)
97 {
98  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
99 
100 
101  if (operands[0] == 0)
102  {
103  std::string msg;
104  msg += "Cannot divide by 0! (token evaluation)\n";
105 
106  throw TokenException(msg);
107  }
108 
109  return (operands[1] / operands[0]);
110 }
111 
112 
113 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
114 // n-ary operators - ADD, MUL, MIN, MAX, AVG
115 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
116 double AddOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
117  throw (TokenException)
118 {
119  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
120 
121 
122  double sum = 0.0;
123  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < getArity(); ++i)
124  sum += operands[getArity() - 1 - i];
125 
126  return sum;
127 }
128 
129 double MulOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
130  throw (TokenException)
131 {
132  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
133 
134 
135  double mul = 1.0;
136  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < getArity(); ++i)
137  mul *= operands[getArity() - 1 - i];
138 
139  return mul;
140 }
141 
142 double MinOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
143  throw (TokenException)
144 {
145  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
146 
147 
148  std::vector<std::vector<double>::const_iterator> minList;
149  minList = utils::search::min<std::vector<double> >(
150  operands.begin(), (operands.begin() + getArity()));
151 
152  return *(minList[0]);
153 }
154 
155 double MaxOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
156  throw (TokenException)
157 {
158  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
159 
160 
161  std::vector<std::vector<double>::const_iterator> maxList;
162  maxList = utils::search::max<std::vector<double> >(
163  operands.begin(), (operands.begin() + getArity()));
164 
165  return *(maxList[0]);
166 }
167 
168 double AvgOp::operator()(const std::vector<double>& operands) const
169  throw (TokenException)
170 {
171  assert(operands.size() == getArity());
172 
173 
174  double avg = 0.0, c = (1.0 / (double) getArity());
175  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < getArity(); ++i)
176  avg += (c * operands[getArity() - 1 - i]);
177 
178  return avg;
179 }
